room_title: Escape room "Pharaohs Tomb: Anubis' Wrath" by Escape Rooms Portland Michigan in Lansing
review: I booked a party of 8 for my daughters birthday in the Pharaoh's Tomb and we were able to escape with seconds to go....what a great time! I would highly recommend this event. Lots of fun and watching everyone working as a team was the best.
